summary: This is a calendar invitation for a recurring weekly meeting titled 'CID Case Updates Meeting for SCs and UCs'. The meeting was scheduled to occur on Thursdays, starting on June 14, 2018, and was to be held in a CID (likely Criminal Investigation Division) conference room. The document itself was created and modified in November 2018.

events.title: Initial CID Case Updates Meeting
events.description: Scheduled start of a recurring weekly meeting for case updates, likely for Special Counsels (SCs) and Undercover agents/units (UCs).

events.title: Final Scheduled CID Case Updates Meeting
events.description: The scheduled end date for the recurring weekly case updates meetings.

keyFacts: A recurring weekly meeting for case updates was established for personnel designated as SCs (Special Counsels) and UCs (likely Undercover agents/units).
The meeting was scheduled to be held in a CID (Criminal Investigation Division) conference room, indicating an official law enforcement or investigative context.
The meeting series was scheduled to run from June 14, 2018, through November 29, 2018, every Thursday.
The document is classified as UNCLASSIFIED.
The calendar event was created and modified in November 2018, which is after the meeting series began in June.
